1692.00.text: But, I so feel your pain, that you're trying to capture the voice

1697.72.text: of this wondrous, wild and beautiful country,

1700.60.text: and you keep ending up in the West Midlands.

1704.56.text: I am going to put David's South African accent into Room 101.

1716.88.text: And that brings us to the end of the show - well done, David,

1719.96.text: you were the most persuasive guest, so you are this week's winner.

1728.88.text: In no way helped by the fact the you were Doctor Who -

1734.24.text: Thanks very much, David Tennant, Sir Trevor McDonald and Aisling Bea -
